item.title: Panel Data: Advanced Concepts
item.description:
This note explores advanced topics in panel data econometrics, especially when applying causal inference logic.

Key Topics Covered:

  • âš–ï¸ Assumptions of DiD in Staggered Treatment: Parallel trends, heterogeneous treatment
  • ğŸ”„ Event Study Designs: Pre-trend testing and dynamic treatment effects
  • ğŸ§ª Instrumental Variables in Panel Setting: Controlling for endogeneity across time

Based on: Wooldridge (2010),
